snippet: In the hallway outside the room, he was pushed to the ground and handcuffed before eventually being released. Alex Padilla served as a Los Angeles city councilman (19992–006), California state senator (2006–14), and California secretary of state (2015–21).

title: U.S. Senate: U.S. Senator Alex Padilla
